episode.title: 田中くんのバレンタイン
Tanaka-kun`s Valentine
Tanaka-kun no Valentine
episode.summary: Today is Valentine`s Day. While girls and boys are excited, Tanaka, who`s not interested in Valentine`s at all, finds a box of chocolates inside his bag. Judging by the pretty box, it`s obvious the giver has feelings for him, but Tanaka feels despair just thinking about having to show gratitude or giving something in return. There`s no name on the attached message and only says "I`m watching you all the time." Tanaka and Ohta try to figure out the culprit... i.e. the girl behind the chocolates. Source: crunchyroll
